name: biomarker_name
label: Biomarker Name
description: Name of the biomarker being tested

name: biomarker_value
label: Biomarker Value
description: Numeric value of the biomarker test result

name: biomarker_unit
label: Unit
description: Unit of measurement for the biomarker value

name: biomarker_date
label: Test Date
description: Date when the biomarker test was performed

name: biomarker_notes
label: Notes
description: Additional notes about the biomarker result

name: biomarker_reference_low
label: Reference Range Low
description: Lower limit of the normal reference range

name: biomarker_reference_high
label: Reference Range High
description: Upper limit of the normal reference range

name: biomarker_test_code
label: Test Code
description: Laboratory test code for the biomarker
